channel.title: TIL on Yuwen's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in TIL on Yuwen's Blog

item.title: How to build and maintain this blog
item.description: 1. Workflow Add posts by hugo new posts/post_name.md git add . git commit -m "" Generate the site by hugo cd public git add . git commit -m "" git push Run hugo server and view website locally at localhost:1313 2. Resources Hugo-PaperMod (GitHub) MissCoding (YouTube) Envato Tuts+ (YouTube) Lil’Log Simon Willison’s Weblog Eli Bendersky’s website
